# About

First of all the global variable **CLIMEX.PATH** has to be set. Just add the following lines to ~/.Rprofile
```{r}
CLIMEX.PATH <<- "~/R/climex/"
if ( !dir.exists( CLIMEX.PATH ) )
    dir.create( CLIMEX.PATH, recursive = TRUE )
```
